add_library(SDL3::SDL3 SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_target_properties(
    SDL3::SDL3 PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL3.lib"
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/SDL3.dll"
    INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include"
)
install(
    IMPORTED_RUNTIME_ARTIFACTS SDL3::SDL3
    RUNTIME DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/$<CONFIGURATION>"
)
